mapper.select: select * from ba_baza where orgcode = #{map.orgCode} and baza27 >=to_char(to_date(#{map.startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd') and baza27 <=to_char(to_date(#{map.startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd')

select a.* from ba_baf1 a,ba_baza b where a.orgcode=b.orgcode and a.baza00=b.baza00 and a.orgcode = #{map.orgCode} and b.baza27 >=to_char(to_date(#{map.startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.baza27 <=to_char(to_date(#{map.startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd')

select a.* from ba_baf4 a,ba_baza b where a.orgcode=b.orgcode and a.baza00=b.baza00 and a.orgcode = #{map.orgCode} and b.baza27 >=to_char(to_date(#{map.startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.baza27 <=to_char(to_date(#{map.startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd')

select a.* from ba_baf6 a,ba_baza b where a.orgcode=b.orgcode and a.baza00=b.baza00 and a.orgcode = #{map.orgCode} and b.baza27 >=to_char(to_date(#{map.startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.baza27 <=to_char(to_date(#{map.startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd')
